titles.title: Strengthening the Medical Examiner and Coroner System Act of 2024
Strengthening the Medical Examiner and Coroner System Act of 2024
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to encourage qualified individuals to enter the forensic pathology workforce, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
